text: Ebhabe amara apanake pathiyechi emana eka jatira prati yadera age bahu jati gata hayeche, yate amara apanara prati ya ohi karechi, ta tadera kache tila'oyata karena. Tathapi tara rahamanake asbikara kare [1]. Baluna, â€˜tini'i amara raba; tini chara an'ya kono hakka ilaha ne'i. Tamra'i upara ami nirbhara kari ebam tamra'i kache amara phire ya'oya.â€™
